name: Sir Andrew Wiles
thesis_title: Reciprocity Laws and the Conjecture of Birch and Swinnerton-Dyer
known_for: Proving the Taniyama–Shimura Conjecture for semistable elliptic curves, thereby proving Fermat's Last Theorem, Proving the main conjecture of Iwasawa theory
prizes: Whitehead Prize  (1988) , Rolf Schock Prizes in Mathematics  (1995) , Ostrowski Prize  (1995) , Fermat Prize  (1995) , Wolf Prize  (1995/6) , Royal Medal  (1996) , NAS Award in Mathematics  (1996) , Cole Prize  (1997) , Wolfskehl Prize  (1997) , IMU Silver Plaque  (1998) , King Faisal International Prize in Science  (1998) , Shaw Prize  (2005)  Abel Prize  (2016)
